title: 2 Cool 4 School
description: The seemingly impossible game show where kids can walk away with a big cash prize. Wanna win some money? Be nobody’s fool! Then maybe, just maybe, you’re 2 cool 4 school!
quote: How sweet. He wants to go home. Well, you can’t!
altHero: excited hosts in loud, colorful suits with bowties and pale face makeup
alt1: host crouches and talks to kids in the audience
alt2: hosts with a kid on a fake living room set
alt3: host smiling next to a plate of worms and dirt
alt4: the hosts welcome the kid to a door labeled “Terrible teacher’s office”
